tr_deletePersonConfirmation: E tāpeʻa anei i te parau no teie taata mai roto mai i te rata o to outou amuiraa? Ia vai tāna iʻoa no te Organized, e ere roa oʼna e nehenehe e tomo i te mau parau atoa no to outou amuiraa.
tr_noResultsDesc: E tamata i te mau taoʻa imi hou aore rā te mau tātaritaraa hou
tr_addNewPerson: Te tapiri i te hoê taata apī
tr_unbaptizedPublisher: Te taata poro aita i bapetizo-hia
tr_midweekMeetingStudent: Te orometua no te rāvea o te hepetoma
tr_addTimeAway: E tapiri i to oe taime faaea i vaho nei ia faaterehia te reira e te mau taeaʻe ia faaineine i te mau rāvea i mua.
tr_emergencyContacts: Te mau numera i te hora o te ati
tr_addEmergencyContacts: Te tapiri i te mau taata tapihi mai roto mai i te papera ‘Aita toto’, ia nehenehe te tiaau pǔpǔ e farerei mau i te mau taata tano no te hoê ati.

tr_addContact: Te tapiri i te hoê taata tapihi
tr_manageAccessFullTitle: Te faatere i te mau iʻoa tavini
tr_addUser: Te tapiri i te hoê taata tavini
tr_congregationPersons: Te mau taata o te amuiraa
tr_congregationPersonsDesc: Te hono i te mau iʻoa tavini i te mau parau taata no Organized, te faatitatiraa i te mau tiʻaraa e te mau tiʻa, te hiʻoraa i te numera tomo i te pǔpǔ aore rā te faatae i te mau taata na roto i te nahonaho i niʼa i te hoê taata tavini.
tr_baptizedAndAppointed: Te mau taeaʻe i bapetizo-hia e i faʻaearaahia
tr_baptizedAndAppointedDesc: Te tiʻaraa tiaau haʻapaari e horoʻahia no te mau ruʻau anaʼe aore rā te mau taeaʻe tei faʻatiahia e te mau ruʻau.
tr_appAdministrators: Te mau tiaau haʻapaari o te api
tr_appAdministrator: Te tiaau haʻapaari o te api
tr_publicTalkCoordinator: Tahu’a nenei i te mau oreroraa parau faufaa
tr_midweekMeetingOverseer: Tiau o te tairururaa no te oraraa e te taviniraa
tr_userRights: Mau ti’araa o te hoê taata fa’a’ohipa
tr_midweekStudentStatusDefault: Ua hofa‘i-’a te reira taata i te tu‘u i te ‘ōraraa i te Tairururaa tuha‘i i te oraraa e te taviniraa. No reira, e nehenehe te reira taata e hi‘o i te mau horo‘aa no te tairururaa i te mea faaherehera.
tr_publisherStatusDefault: Ua tonohia teie taata ei paraparau parau mau i te pae varua. No reira, e nehenehe òna e hi‘o i te mau paporaa tairururaa e e tono i te mau rata no te taviniraa i te mau mahana na roto i te mea faaherehera ra.
tr_profileSettings: Te mau fa‘anahoraa o te hoê rata
tr_bindWithRecord: Fa‘atîtî i te hoê rata taata
tr_delegatePersons: Te mau taata i faahofa‘i-’a ei tiare
tr_delegatePersonsDesc: Na roto i te faahofa‘i-’a i te hoê taata mai roto i te amuiraa, e faaherehere ra oe i teie taata e hi‘o i ta ’na mau horo‘aa tairururaa e e tono i ta ’na mau rata no te taviniraa i te mau mahana.
tr_invitationCodeInstruction: Ia faaôhô i te hoê mau taputapu apî no te taata fa’a’ohipa, e faatupu i te reira numera tomo faahôfa‘i, e parau atu ia ’na ia iriti i te organized-app.com. I muri iho, ia ma’u oia i to ’na i‘oa taata fa’a’ohipa e ia tomo i te numera tomo faahôfa‘i i te faaitehia mai.
tr_generateInvitationCode: Faatupu i te numera tomo faahōfa‘i
tr_terminateSessionAdminDesc:
E tāpe‘a noa te taata fa’a’ohipa i te tomo i ta’na mau taputapu e tae noa ’tu i te taime e faaore ai oe i te tau tumu. I muri a‘e i te reira, e titauhia ’tu ia ’na ia tomo faahou i Organized ma te fa’a’ohipa i ta’na numera tomo faahōfa‘i.
Ia fa’a’ohipa i teie tereraa i te mau taime roroofa mau e i te mau huru parururaa noa ra.
tr_baptizedBrotherUserDesc:
Ua bapetizohia teie taeae e ua tonohia oia ei paraparau parau mau i te pae varua. No reira, e nehenehe teie taata e hi‘o i te mau paporaa tairururaa e e tono i ta’na mau rata taviniraa i te mau mahana na roto i te mea faaherehera ra.
E nehenehe oe e horo‘a atu i te tahi atu mau ti’araa fa’a’ohipa i raro nei.
tr_appAdminRoleDesc: E nehenehe oia e fa’a’ohipa i te mau tereraa atoa o Organized no te fa’anaho i te mau mea atoa e no te tauturu
tr_coordinatorRoleDesc: E nehenehe oia e fa’a’ohipa i te mau tereraa atoa o Organized, e vai atu te horo‘a e te faaore i te mau ti’araa fa’a’ohipa atoa
tr_secretaryRoleDesc: E nehenehe oia e fa’a’ohipa i te mau tereraa atoa o Organized, e vai atu te mau rata o te amuiraa, te taviniraa i te mau mahana, te feia i tae mai, te mau papearaa o te mau paraparau parau mau, e te tahi atu mau mea
tr_serviceOverseerRoleDesc: E nehenehe oia e hi‘o i te mau rata o te mau paraparau parau mau, i te mau teritore o te amuiraa, e i te mau fa‘anahoraa no te pororaa i te mau vahi taata
tr_deleteInvitationCode: Faaore i te numera tomo faahōfa‘i
tr_regenerateInvitationCode: Faatupu faahou i te numera tomo faahōfa‘i
tr_rolesAndSettingSuccessMessage: Ua faanea-pinepine-hia te mau ti‘araa tavini atoa e te mau fa‘anahoraa atoa
tr_deleteInvitationCodeTitle: Faaore i te numera tomo faahōfa‘i
tr_deleteInvitationCodeDesc:
Ia faaore oe i teie numera tomo faahōfa‘i, eita òna e nehenehe faahou e tomo i nā taputapu apī ma te fa’a’ohipa i teie numera.
Ia hinaaro oe ia tomo faahou te taata fa’a’ohipa, e titauhia ia faatupu i te hoê numera tomo faahōfa‘i apī e ia horo‘a atu ia ’na.
tr_deleteUserProfile: Faaore i te rata taata fa’a’ohipa mai Organized
tr_deleteUserProfileDesc:
E papû anei ’oe e hinaaro oe e faaore roa i teie rata taata fa’a’ohipa nei mai te râiti o te mau taata fa’a’ohipa Organized no to ’outou amuiraa? Ia iriti faahou te taata i te poroi, e faaore-roa-hia ta ’na mau rata i to ’na iho taputapu e e tia ’tu ia ’na ia ho‘i i te api no te papai i to ’na i‘oa.

Ia haamana‘o maitai: te faaoreraa i te rata taata fa’a’ohipa, eita e faaore i ta ’na parau i roto i te api « Mau taata ». E tonohia noa ’tu òna i reira.
tr_additionalUserRights: Te mau ti’araa fa’a’ohipa hau atu
tr_midweekMeetingScheduling: Fa‘anahoraa tairururaa tuha‘i i te hepetoma
tr_weekendMeetingScheduling: Fa‘anahoraa tairururaa i te hope‘a hepetoma
tr_meetingDutiesScheduling: Fa‘anahoraa i te mau ohipa tairururaa

tr_publicWitnessingScheduling: Fa‘anahoraa no te pororaa i te mau vahi taata
tr_literatureManagement: Te fa‘anahoraa i te mau papai bibilia
tr_congregationTerritoriesManagement: Te fa‘anahoraa i te mau teritore o te amuiraa
tr_coVisitScheduling: Fa‘anahoraa no te tereraa a te tiau poritita
tr_informationBoardEditing: Fa‘anahoraa i te papa parau mārama
tr_congregationActivitiesScheduling: Fa‘anahoraa i te mau ohipa o te amuiraa
tr_hallCleaningScheduling: Fa‘anahoraa i te horoiraa i te piha haapiiraa
tr_addNewOrganizedUserTitle: Faaopoopo i te hoê taata fa’a’ohipa Organized apī
tr_addNewOrganizedUserDesc:
Na mua, e tia i te hoê taeae bapetizohia ia papai i to’na i‘oa i roto i Organized.
I muri iho, ia fa’a’ohipa i to’na rata uira no te imi i ta’na rata e ia faaopoopo ia ’na i roto i to ’outou amuiraa.
tr_publisherOrMidweekStudent: Ia ma‘iti i te ti‘araa o te taata fa‘a‘ohipa: paraparau parau mau aore ra tairururaa tuha‘i i te oraraa e te taviniraa
tr_userEmailAddress: Te rata uira o te taata fa’a’ohipa
tr_userFoundSuccess: Ua itehia te taata fa’a’ohipa! Ia nenei a‘e i teie rata taata fa’a’ohipa i to’na parau taata i roto i te mau papearaa.
tr_enterUserEmail: E tomo i te rata uira no te hiʻo e ua tapaʻohia aʻenei aore rā aita
tr_bindUser: Te hono i te taata tavini
tr_addNewPublisherDesc: E maiti i te hoê parau taata mai roto mai i te rata taata o to outou amuiraa ia rave e ia tapiho i tāna numera tomo i te pǔpǔ taa ê.
tr_inviteUserDesc: E horoʻa i teie numera tomo i te pǔpǔ ia nehenehe te taata tavini e tomo i te amuiraa o outou i nia i Organized. Te vai atoa ra te reira i nia i tāna api taata tavini.
tr_newUserAddedSuccess: Ua tapiri-hia te hoê taata tavini apī
tr_newUserAddedSuccessDesc: Te vai nei te iʻoa tavini na {{ PersonName }}
tr_congregationSettingsDesc: Teie mau faanahoraa e tano no te amuiraa atoa
tr_useDisplayNameOnSchedules: Te faaohipa i te iʽoa faaite i nia i te mau faanahoraa rāvea
tr_displayNameMeetingDesc: Te faaohipa i te “Mike S.” mai te “Mike Stevens”. Te iʽoa taatoa atoʼa ra e vai mau i nia i Organized
tr_exactDatesOnMidweekMeetings: Te faaite i te mau mahana mau i nia i te mau faanahoraa rāvea o te hepetoma
tr_exactDatesOnMidweekMeetingsDesc: Te faaite i te mau mahana o te rāvea mau mai te mahana o te Moni
tr_useDisplayNameMeeting: Te faaohipa i te mau iʽoa faaite i nia i te mau faanahoraa rāvea
tr_useDisplayNameOthers: Te faaohipa i te mau iʽoa faaite i nia i te tahi atu mau faanahoraa
tr_useDisplayNameOthersDesc: E mea maitai no te mau hopoʻa aore rā te mau faanahoraa horoi e rahi roa te mau parau. E tamata e e hiʻo i te hoê faanahoraa e mea maitai aʻe
tr_recordOnlineAttendance: Te tapaʻo i te feia i tae mai i te rāvea na nia i te uira
tr_recordOnlineAttendanceDesc: Te tapiri i te hoê vāhi tomo ‘Na nia i te uira’ ia tapaʻo maitai i te feia i tae mai na nia i te uira e te feia i tae mai i te fare
tr_kingdomHallAddressDesc: Te vāhi noho no te faaite i te vāhi o te rāvea i te mau orero tapiho
tr_meetingSettings: Te mau faanahoraa no te rāvea
tr_autoAssignOpeningPrayer: Te faatere tamau i te tiaau no te pure tamau
tr_autoAssignClosingPrayer: Te faatere tamau i te tiaau no te pure hope
tr_assignAuxCounselor: Te faatere i te tiaau aratai no te piha haapiiraa tauturu rahi
tr_assignAuxCounserlorDesc: Hoê taeaʻe anaʼe tei faaterehia ei tiaau na te mea tumu. E nehenehe te tahi atu taeaʻe e faaterehia na te rima ia hinaarohia.
tr_langGroupsDesc: E nehenehe e rave rahi mau pǔpǔ reo i roto i to outou amuiraa e e ohipa amui.
tr_langGroupEnable: Te pǔpǔ reo i roto i te amuiraa
tr_langGroupEnableDesc: Te faatiahia i te rave i te mau pǔpǔ reo i roto i to outou amuiraa
tr_congregationEncryptionTitle: Te numera huna parau no te amuiraa
tr_congregationEncryptionDesc: E tapeʻa maitai i teie numera huna parau faufaa roa – no te huna i te mau parau o to outou amuiraa, ia ore te hoê taata aita tāna numera e nehenehe e hiʻo. Ia ere te reira, e titauhia ia rave faahou i to outou amuiraa. A haapii atu e nahea matou e tapeʻa nei i te mau parau atoa o outou.
tr_meetinMaterialsTitle: Te mau papera rāvea, te mau parau tono e te mau faanahoraa
tr_circuitOverseerSettingDesc: Te iʽoa o te tiaau teritori e faaohipahia no te mau faanahoraa. Te hepetoma o te farereiraa i mua atoʼa e faaitehia i nia i te mau api tano, ia noaa mau te mau taata poro i te parau.
tr_coNextVisitWeek: Te hepetoma o te farereiraa i mua atoʼa
tr_addNextVisit: Te tapiri i te farereiraa i mua atoʼa
tr_autoApprovePublicMinistry: Te faatiʻa tamau i te mau tono taviniraa i mua i te taata
tr_autoApprovePublicMinistryDesc: Te faatiʻa tamau i te mau tono atoa. Ia faaohipa ma te haapao maitai
tr_autoApproveTerritoryRequests: Te faatiʻa tamau i te mau tono teritoria
tr_autoApproveTerritoryRequestsDesc: Te horoʻa tamau i te mau teritoria e vai ra ia tono te hoê taata poro
tr_notifyOverdue: Te faaite i te mau taata poro no nia i te mau mea i hope roa ʿi
tr_sendOverdueNotificationDesc: Te tono faaite ia hope roa ʿi te teritoria i te ohipa
tr_enablePublicLinks: Te faatiahia i te mau tapiho no te hiʻo i te mau api taa ê
tr_enablePublicLinksDesc: E maiti i te mau api e hinaaro oe e tapiho na roto i te tapiho ia farerei i te feia aita tā rātou Organized.
tr_coVisitSchedules: Te mau fa‘anahoraa no te tereraa a te tiau poritita
tr_serviceMeetingSchedules: Te mau fa‘anahoraa tairururaa taviniraa i te mau mahana
tr_newLangGroupCreatedSuccess: Te ropu reo apī ua faatupuhia ma te mārama
tr_newLangGroupCreatedSuccessDesc: {{ LanguageGroupName }} ua ineine roa no te fa‘anahoraa e e nehenehe te feia faatere e te mau melo o te ropu e hi‘o ia ’na mai te api Accueil ra
tr_addNewLangGroup: Faaopoopo i te hoê ropu reo apī
tr_addNewLangGroupDesc:
Ia tomo i te i‘oa tāmau o te ropu mai te jw.org ra, e ia ma‘iti i to’na reo.
Ia ore te reo e vai ra i roto ia Organized, ia faaite mai i to mātou tauturu no te haaati i te reira i roto i te poroi.
tr_groupNameOptional: I‘oa o te ropu (e mea faufaa ore)
tr_addNewLangGroupMembersDesc:
I muri a‘e, ia faaopoopo i te mau melo atoa o te ropu e ia tonohia te hoê tiau ropu e te hoê tauturu.
Ia haapapû maitai e hoê o teie mau taeae i te pae ra, te vai ra to’na ti‘araa faatere i roto i te râiti o te mau taata fa’a’ohipa o te amuiraa, ia nehenehe oia e faatere i te ropu i roto ia Organized.
tr_groupAdmins: Te mau faatere o te ropu
tr_groupMembers: Te mau taata o te ropu
tr_newServiceGroupCreatedSuccess: New field service group created successfully
tr_deleteServiceGroupDesc: If you delete this group, you’ll need to manually reassign its publishers. Are you sure you want to continue?
tr_createNewGroupDesc: The group number is defined by its order in the list. Optionally, give the group a name if your congregation uses one, for example, a location-based name. Select a group overseer and his assistant.
tr_createNewGroupLastStep: Finally, add publishers to the group. You can edit all these details later if needed.
tr_markDisqualifiedDesc: Disqualified persons cannot participate in meeting parts until re-qualified.
tr_timeAwayAddedSuccessDesc: Thanks for keeping your availability up-to-date
tr_appointSubstituteSpeaker: Appoint a substitution for visiting speakers
tr_displayWSConductorSubstitutions: Display Watchtower study conductor substitutions in the schedule
tr_displayWSConductorDesc: For dates when the main conductor is away or sick
tr_repeatedMonthlyWarningDesc: This person already has an assignment this month
tr_yourOutgoingSpeakers: Te mau orero o to outou amuiraa
tr_discoverableSetting: Te faaite i to outou amuiraa ia farerei i nia i Organized
tr_discoverableSettingDesc: Te faatiahia i te tahi atu mau amuiraa i nia i Organized ia farerei i to outou amuiraa na roto i te iʽoa aore rā te numera e ia tono mai i te rata o to outou mau orero o te amuiraa
tr_addCongregation: Te tapiri i te hoê amuiraa
tr_publicTalksLong: Te mau oreroraa parau i mua i te taata
tr_whoHasAccess: Te feia e nehenehe e tomo
tr_noSpeakersYet: Aita hoʻi e orero o te amuiraa i teie nei. E tapiri i te reira na roto i te faatitatiraa i to outou rata.
tr_noCongregationsYetInfo: Aita hoʻi outou i tapiri i te hoê amuiraa i teie nei. E tapiri i te hoê amuiraa ia hiʻo i te rata orero a te reira e ia faaohipa i roto i te mau faanahoraa.
tr_congregationInOrganized: Te amuiraa i nia i Organized
tr_addOrganizedCongregationDesc: Aita e farerei i te amuiraa e imi nei oe? Ia haapapû e ua faaite te reira i to rātou amuiraa ia farerei e te tahi atu i nia i Organized. Ia rave rātou i te reira, e nehenehe oe e tono i te nehenehe e tomo i te rata o to rātou mau orero o te amuiraa na roto i te api.
tr_addManualCongregationDesc: Te tapiri na te rima i te hoê amuiraa aita hoʻi i nia i Organized i teie nei. Ia tomo mai rātou i te api, e nehenehe oe e tāpū amui i te rata o to rātou mau orero o te amuiraa.
tr_auxiliaryPioneersContinuous: Te mau pionie tauturu e tavini tamau
tr_highestAuxPioNumber: Te numera teitei roa ʿi no te mau pionie tauturu
tr_avgAuxPioMonthly: Te numera mediu no te mau pionie tauturu i te avaʻe atoa
tr_avgHoursMonthly: Te numera mediu o te mau hora i te avaʻe atoa
tr_highestStudiesNumberMonthly: Te numera teitei roa ʿi no te mau haapiiraa Bibilia i te avaʻe atoa
tr_avgStudiesMonthly: Te numera mediu no te mau haapiiraa Bibilia i te avaʻe atoa
tr_highestHourNumberMonthly: Highest number of hours per month
tr_markToBranchOffice: Mark report as submitted to the branch office
tr_markToBranchOfficeDesc: You’re about to mark this report as submitted to the branch office. Are you sure to continue?
tr_branchOfficeReportMonthsDesc: This report hasn’t been generated yet. Generate it to see all the details and then submit.
tr_s1Report: Congregation’s field service and meeting attendance (S-1)
tr_baptizedActiveMultiple: Multiple active records are found in the baptized publisher status. Make sure only one is active.
tr_unbaptizedActiveMultiple: Multiple active records are found in the unbaptized publisher status. Make sure only one is active.
tr_midweekActiveMultiple: Multiple active records are found in the midweek meeting student status. Make sure only one is active.
tr_baptizedInvalidRecords: This person is not a baptized publisher but has active records for that status. Add end date or delete these records.
tr_unbaptizedInvalidRecords: This person is not an unbaptized publisher but has active records for that status. Add end date or delete these records.
tr_midweekInvalidRecords: This person is not a midweek meeting student but has active records for that status. Add end date or delete these records.
tr_privilegesActiveMultiple: Multiple active records are found for the privileges. Make sure only one is active.
tr_enrollemntsActiveMultiple: Multiple active records are found for the enrollments. Make sure that previous records have the end date.
tr_personAddedDesc: New person was added to the congregation
tr_personDeletedDesc: If deleted by mistake, add the person again
tr_userDeletedDesc: {{ UserName }} no longer has a user account and cannot log in to your congregation
tr_markQualifiedDesc: Meeting parts can be assigned to this person again.
tr_personTimeAwayDesc: No time away added yet. Keep it up to date so that it can be taken into account when creating future meeting schedules.
tr_personEmergencyDesc: Add contact persons from the ’No Blood’ document, ensuring the group overseer always has the right people to reach in case of an emergency.
tr_showTimeAwayToAllUsers: Show time away to all users
tr_allowAllUsersToViewTheTimeDesc: Allow all users to view the time away of other publishers. Otherwise, only appointed brothers can see it.
tr_noPersonsAddedDesc: Start adding people to your congregation by clicking ’Add person’ and filling out their information. This will make scheduling and reporting easier.
tr_searchResultsNoneDesc: Try changing your search input or filters, and double-check for typos.
tr_personRecordExists: This person already exists in your congregation persons list.
tr_publicTalkAddSongs: Add songs to this public talk
tr_publicTalkAddSongsDesc: If the speaker has a song list for this public talk, please provide it here for better scheduling.
tr_speakerTalksSongsDesc: Here you can edit songs for each public talks of this speaker.
tr_outgoingSpeakersHide: Hide your congregation from other congregations on Organized?
tr_outgoingSpeakersHideDesc:
Other congregations using Organized won’t be able to find your congregation and request your speakers list anymore. You can make it visible again later at any time.

Congregations that already have access to your speakers list will keep it, unless you manually revoke their access.
tr_outgoingSpeakersAccess: Congregations granted access to your outgoing speakers list
tr_outgoingSpeakersAccessNoneDesc: No congregations have access to your outgoing speakers list yet. To allow other congregations to find yours and send a request, make sure your congregation is discoverable in Organized.
tr_outgoingSpeakersAccessActiveDesc: The following congregations can view your outgoing speakers list and contact information of your congregation provided by you.
tr_congregationDetailsDesc: Fill out the necessary contact info and address for this congregation to share with your outgoing speakers.
tr_incomingCongregationNoSpeakers: No visiting speakers yet. Edit the congregation list to start adding speakers and their talks.
tr_congregationSecurityDesc: In Organized, your privacy and security are top priority. The app has several layers of protection in place. Two important ones are the ‘Congregation access code’ and the ‘Congregation master key’. They keep congregation data safely encrypted and allow only authorized users to access it. Learn more about these and other security features.
tr_congregationMasterKeyDesc: This code is essential for securely accessing congregation data, including congregation and ministry reports, the persons list, and other information only available to appointed brothers. It's the most important code – losing it could result in losing all congregation data.
tr_congregationAccessCodeDesc: This is your congregation's unique code for connecting new users or logging in. It's used to encrypt congregation data for all users.
tr_createMasterKeyIntroDesc: This key securely encrypts your congregation's data, including reports and persons, and is required for administrative actions such as data export/import or making significant changed to settings.
tr_incomingCongregationOnlineNoSpeakers: This congregation does not have any visiting speakers yet added to their records. If necessary, you can personally contact them.
tr_incomingCongregationOnlinePending: This congregation did not yet approve your request to access their outgoing speakers list. If necessary, you can personally contact them.
tr_incomingCongregationOnlineDisapproved: This congregation rejected your request to access their outgoing speakers list. If necessary, you can contact them personally.
tr_congregationRequestRejectedDesc: The {{ congregationNameAndNumber }} congregation rejected your request to view their outgoing speakers list. If necessary, you can contact them personally.
tr_congregationAccessRevokeDesc: Revoke access to your speakers list for {{ congregationName }} congregation? They won't be able to see it anymore, but you can share it with them again later if they make a new request.
tr_noGroupsYet: You don’t have any field service groups created yet. Create a group first to start adding publishers and reordering groups.
tr_autoCheckUpdateDesc: Automatically import meeting materials from jw.org at your selected interval
tr_groupRemoveConfirm: Do you want to remove the publisher from the Group {{ group }}?
tr_showOutgoingToAll: Show outgoing speakers schedule to all users
tr_showOutgoingToAllDesc: Allow all users to view the outgoing talks schedule. Otherwise, only appointed brothers can see it.
tr_showAwayToAllDesc: Allow all users to view the time away of other publishers. Otherwise, only appointed brothers can see it.
tr_showAwayToAll: Show time away to all users
tr_masterKeyChangeDesc: We advise changing the code only if unauthorized access to it is suspected. After creating a new code, securely note and share it only with the appointed brothers who need it.
tr_settingsAutoSaved: All settings adjustments are saved automatically
tr_bindUserRecordAssignmentsNotice: To view your upcoming assignments, make sure first that your device is connected to the internet. Then open the Manage access page to locate your user account and bind it with a record from your congregation persons list.
tr_quickSettingsDesc: Easily update your settings for this page on-the-go. These settings are synced with the congregation settings page, so you can manage them from either location at any time.
tr_upcomingEventsEmpty: The upcoming events list is empty for now. Once elders add new events, they will appear here.
tr_activePublisherTooltip: Clicking the checkbox sets the status start date on the first click; clicking again adds the end date. You can edit them by expanding the detailed history menu below.
tr_enableCongregationDataSyncDesc: This feature lets sync data like schedules with other users in your congregation and use the app on multiple devices at the same time. (Before enabling, make sure that using online apps to store nonconfidential records is approved for your branch territory)
tr_applicationRejectedDesc: This application has been rejected. Inform the publisher about its status.
tr_serviceGroupsListNone: No field service groups yet. The groups will appear here as soon as they are created.
tr_addUserSyncNeeded: Enable congregation sync to add users
tr_addUserSyncNeededDesc: To add more users to your congregation, enable the congregation sync feature. This allows you to add more users and devices for better collaboration. You can turn this feature on or off anytime in the congregation settings.
tr_deleteCongregationDesc: Are you sure to delete your congregation from Organized? This will completely remove all your congregation data and there is no way to recover them anymore. All user accounts linked to your congregation will also be deleted. Enter below the congregation master key to confirm the deletion.
tr_exportDesc: Export your congregation data to create a local backup or transfer it to another app.
tr_importDesc: Upload a file to import. Consider exporting your current data first to keep a backup for potential restoration later.
tr_uploadJsonFile: Upload a file in JSON format
tr_importDataConfirmDesc: Select the data you want to import to replace your records in Organized
tr_importDataCompletedDesc: Your data has been imported successfully. Organized app will now reload.
tr_lateReportTooltip: Mark a report as 'Late' if the monthly branch office report has already been submitted. Late report will automatically be included in next month's submission.
tr_joinRequestsDesc: The following users requested access to join your congregation:
tr_joinRequestsAcceptDesc: Bind the user to a person record and assign the correct roles. Click Continue to save.
tr_languageGroupDeleteDesc: Are you sure to delete this language group? All publishers assigned to the group will be removed.
tr_languageGroupExists: This language group already exists in your records
tr_setPersonToFamilyHead: Set this person as the family head to add family members
tr_personAlreadyMemberOfFamily: This person is a member of the {{ familyHead }} family. To edit the family members list, go to the family head's profile.
tr_maximumAmountOfGroupsIs10: Maximum amount of field service groups is 10
tr_weekendTemplateShowSongs: Display songs on weekend meeting schedules
